reviewText: One of the dvds was scratched and didn't work at all
Great, granddaughter likes both movies and price was fabulous.

This is NOT a "3D Blu-ray".
It is a "Blu-ray that's in 3D" meaning the old red/blue cardboard glasses.
(same as the DVD release of this title)

Don't understand why this isn't in the real "3D Blu-ray" format.
The French release is a real "3D Blu-ray" but, unfortunately the audio is FRENCH ONLY.
I guess us Americans are only good enough for the "old-fashioned" cardboard 3D glasses version.
How stupid. Needless to say, I won't be buying this.
Thank  you for putting both movie in one.
great value, very entertaining, fun for the whole family
